content: inishfree shawl is a beautiful crochet lace rectangle shawl with a delicate wave stitch pattern use your favourite gradient yarn cake to make this beautiful flowing shawl wrap an easy relaxing crochet experience the paid pdf includes a crochet chart yarn scheepjes whirl 1000m/225gr 60% cotton 40% acrylic 1 ball in blackberry mint chip 769 or your favourite whirl 3 5mm crochet hook gauge 20sts x 10 row = 10cm measurements 20 x 72 51 x 183cm lightly blocked concentration is required for the first few row and once 4 row pattern repeat is established relax and enjoy gauge is not important use your favourite yarn and matching hook - size is easily adjusted **available in dutch** with thanks to gea zoer for translation
